title: Rainforest: the struggle for light
creator_credit: Queensland. Dept. of Education. Media Services and Peter Bull
brief_description:
Considers the interaction between sunlight and rainforest vegetation. Introduces concepts such as adaptation and succession.
Suitable for upper secondary level.
creator_credit_for_label: Queensland. Dept. of Education. Media Services and Peter Bull
